body:
You can't use this complaints form to complain about a judge, tribunal member or magistrate. You'll need to [make a complaint to the Judicial Conduct Investigation Office (JCIO)](https://judicialconduct.judiciary.gov.uk/).

The JCIO do not accept complaints about a judgeâ€™s decision or
the way a judge has managed a case. They will only look at complaints about personal misconduct by the judiciary.
heading: If you want to complain about a member of the judiciary
